VUPShionMod:Prayer.NAME: Praying Stance
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yStance, you deal #b25% less damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yRegen.

VUPShionMod:Spirit.NAME: Wordpower Stance
DESCRIPTION: Upon entering this #yStance, gain #b1 #yImmolated and #yStrength. NL At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yRegen.
